original_title: The Rolling Stones - Licked, Live In NYC
overview: The Rolling Stones have released another new live collection, Licked Live in NYC, from the band's performance at Madison Square Garden during their 2003 tour. The title was issued as 1-DVD/2-CDs, 1-SD Blu-ray/2-CDs, 2-CDs and 3-LPs, on June 10, 2022, via the Universal Music Group's Mercury Records.
title: The Rolling Stones - Licked, Live In NYC
